name: Eliécer E. Gutiérrez
award: Oliver Pearson Award of the American Society of Mammalogists

Elmer C. Birney Award of the American Society of Mammalogists—study awarded: “Phylogeography of Marmosa robinsoni, a mouse opossum from dry habitats of the northern Neotropics”. Award received during the 92nd annual meeting of the ASM.
Peter Buck Postdoctoral Fellowship—National Museum of Natural History. Proposal awarded: “Revealing the evolutionary history of the deer genus Odocoileus, with emphasis on the cariacou complex.”
